summary: Multidisciplinary and pro-active e-commerce and marketing professional that understands the balancing act of goal focus and process orientation. I’ve held account management and consultancy roles where I stand out for my sense of responsibility and for being an inspiring leader with a clear vision and great energy to encourage people to achieve the objectives with discipline and agility, focusing on specific targets and business growth through effective and measurable results.

education.field_of_study: Direction and Management in Digital Marketing and Social Media

profile_positions.description:
Mister B is one of the world’s largest players in the field of homoerotic items and erotic items for men, is your one stop specialist store for sex toys, leather fetish, rubber fetish, lubes and much more for men.
• Planning, designing, executing, and monitoring the email marketing campaigns of three different B2C brands through newsletter platforms (Klaviyo and Mailchimp). 
•	Designing, executing, and monitoring the online campaigns through Google Ads, Meta Business Suite (Instagram and Facebook) and Tiktok; as well as monitoring and coordinating third agencies campaigns. 
• Collaboration with the Branding, Marketing, Design, Sales and Operations department to create the Digital Marketing Strategy defining KPIs including sales; improve the market position, brand and products; lead the introduction of new brands, products and/or services to the online market; create an affiliate, social media and online advertising strategy; and monitoring client’s satisfaction regarding delivery times and after-sale follow up.
• Creation of surveys to understand customers’ behaviour, needs and motivations and improve the quality of our communication and nurture them with relevant information according to the market needs. 
• Analysis of performance, insights, and trends data to develop an adequate content strategy, new product development and follow-up of market trends.
• Identification of new E-Commerce opportunities that contribute to improving the business results by monitoring the performance of the online campaigns.
• Content creation for Wings Magazine by elaborating articles regarding the brand, products, events, interviews, and personal experiences.
profile_positions.title: Online Campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
CLIQ Digital is a leading digital lifestyle company, providing consumers worldwide with streaming entertainment services.
• Responsible for specific gateway accounts who knows the gateway’s capability and coverage, leading the negotiation as well as implementing the new product roll out in different countries, including service and billing set-up, coordination of technical implementation and final quality assurance (UX) as well as testing before launch to ensure smooth customer acquisitions, validation of billing, content delivery and revenue of the product launched in the allocated markets.
• Responsible for the usability and compliance standards of our services while assisting in the continuity of the product in the market by regular analysis of KPIs, research of market and competition by working with Head of Business Development to translate the intelligence into marketing optimizations and opportunities.
• Communicating with Gateways regarding new products, rules and regulations, market trends, carrier’s development and compliance by understanding the Gateway’s internal processes, solutions, setup and capability.
• Leading the creation of product prototype/template of online and mobile campaigns, including approval, setup/implementation, launching and monitoring of success by working along with the designers and Head of Business Development to execute and maximize the effectiveness of marketing campaign in the allocated markets according to needs of Affiliate and Media Buy team.
• Ensuring compliance of campaigns and marketing materials according to the country’s regulatory and marketing guidelines in line with the service offering.
• Daily monitoring and analysis of product performance and reporting on the results.
• Working with the Content supplier to arrange necessary content and portal(s) for services.
• Responsible for campaign template set-up, including usability testing and tracking.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager Gateways

profile_positions.description:
Mexgrocer is an online grocery store selling authentic Mexican food, offering worldwide delivery. The food products are chosen with care to be truly authentic, specialising in Mexican groceries & Mexican chillies and delivering unique products that no-one else has.
•	Optimisation of the website and implementation of effective social media strategies as well as Facebook and AdWords campaigns, tracking and optimizing the conversion rate.
•	Rapport building skills and direct contact with distributors in Mexico and some European countries to create content, visual aids and align strategies for both sides.
•	Agreeing on commercial terms for new partners and on contracting, building, consulting and managing new accounts by creating business agreements.
•	Optimisation of the website and implementation of effective social media and mailing strategies as well as PPC campaigns, optimizing the conversion rate and forecasting sales to attract potential customers. Marketplaces (Amazon) management, uploading and updating product’s catalogue.
•	Rapport building skills and gaining commitment with partners by working closely with their offices in Mexico and other European countries as well as the technical, marketing and sales teams to develop new strategies based on the business needs to build strong relationships and to move conversations forward to successful results, always aware to generate new business opportunities.
•	SEO coordination and improvement to verify the position of top products in organic search.
•	Assist in the development of a new website to increase sales with the improvement of UX/UI.
•	Analyse data and insights via Analytics (website traffic, sales, conversion rate, average ticket, geographic location, main searching terms, etc) to determine industry and consumer trends.
profile_positions.title: E-commerce and Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.location: Ciudad de México, Distrito Federal, México
profile_positions.description:
Ignite is a B2B services company focused on e-commerce development that provides clients with a full e-commerce solution: taking care of their entire online experience, from inception to execution. The operating verticals include consulting, web design and maintenance, digital marketing, warehousing, order fulfilment and customer service.
•	Power the growth of our clients’ sales in the last six months by 56% in multiple channels through a proactive advisory in new products, services, international payments landscape, optimisation of platforms and implementation of effective commercial strategies.
•	Increased clients satisfaction by being the main point of contact, formulating and positioning win-win solutions, adding value matching their needs to relevant offerings.
•	Creation of personalised strategies with e-commerce operational tactics to forecast sales and attract website potential customers by integrating marketplaces for making an Omnichannel Platform/Business or/and developing monthly subscriptions.
•	Achievement of business goals by recognizing my emotions and of others, using this information to guide thinking and behaviour and making the difference with client’s interaction. 
•	Joint responsibility of the Marketing Campaigns focused on the performance of the strategy as well as tracking sales, abandoned shopping carts, emails and affiliates campaigns to improve conversion rate.
•	Team Leadership and Management: Customer Service, Operations, Digital Marketing and Sales, working independently while being a team player.
•	Analyse data and insights to determine industry and consumer trends along with the Marketing team.
•	P&L Management, Ecommerce's JBP creation and KPIs achievement.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

profile_positions.location: Ciudad de México, Distrito Federal, México
profile_positions.description:
Codeacamp is a full-stack coding boot camp, bringing coding and web development skills to people who aim to create their own startup, add technical know-how to their skillset or go for the next step in their professional life, teaching coding skills like Ruby, SQL, and the Rails application framework; front-end skills by using advanced CSS patterns, HTML, JavaScript among others.
•	Increased by 86% in students for full-time courses by communicating effectively and clearly expressing information, flexing speech according to the specific business situation and audience. 
•	Responsible for direct sales and communication to prospective and enrolled students, providing high-quality follow up to understand their needs and helping them after finding a job, considering their previous experience and career aspirations.
•	Development of digital marketing strategies and activities to support and increase lead generation by the implementation of Google AdWords, Facebook campaigns, email marketing, affiliates, among others, increasing the number and quality of enquires by 162%.
•	Management of self-time with cross-functional initiatives and projects in a fast-paced and entrepreneurial environment with little supervisión, creating and optimising sales speech and sales team training.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative

profile_positions.location: Ciudad de México, Distrito Federal, México
profile_positions.description:
EY is a world leader in audit, taxation, transaction advisory and consulting services. The analysis and quality services we offer help create trust in capital markets and economies around the world. We develop outstanding leaders who work as a team to fulfil the commitments acquired with our stakeholders. With this, it plays an essential role in creating a better working world for employees, customers and society.
•	Analysis and fiscal advice drawing up formal opinions and memorandums. 
•	Designing and implementation of tax strategies by creating tax burden efficiencies for specific transactions (merge companies, acquisitions, spin-offs, restructuring, stock buy-selling among others).
•	Tax refund, answering requirements, analysis of tax laws applicable to the client.
•	National and international clients recurrent consultation.
•	Advising multinational companies from tax and economic perspective regarding investment opportunities.
•	Representing the company with professional behaviour, acting as a role model of the values before, during and after interactions with clients.
•	Identifying new business opportunities and improvements. Cross and upselling our services.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.location: Ciudad de México, Distrito Federal, México
profile_positions.description:
The PRODECON is a decentralised, non-sectorised public body specialised in tax matters, which provides free, agile and simple advisory, consultation, advocacy and representation services as well as complaint or claim procedures against acts of federal tax authorities that violate the rights of taxpayers.
•	Support in the elaboration of defense resources and tax lawsuit such as reports, requests, memorandums, demands, extension of the claim in nullity proceedings, formulation of pleadings, relief of hearing, direct and indirect protection claims, as well as the litigation before the local and federal authority, achieving 86% of litigated cases won.
profile_positions.title: Junior Litigation Lawyer

profile_positions.location: Ciudad de México, Distrito Federal, México
profile_positions.description:
Fine Research is a Latin American specialist focused in data collection, also running consumer and B2B services. We serve the largest 5 Global Market Research companies, all major global healthcare panels and dozens of middle size international MR agencies from US, Europe, Asia and Latin America, with our own local offices in the key markets of Brazil, Mexico, Colombia, Argentina and Chile.
•	Projects in Market Research, application of surveys.
•	Eye Tracking study.
•	Audit of product packaging on retailers with training in North Carolina by P&G.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Techo is an organization located in Latin America and the Caribe that seeks to overcome the situation of poverty that thousands of people live in precarious settlements, through the joint action of its residents and young volunteers.
- For more than a year I went to a marginalized community in Mexico City to help with the education of the children, teaching them math, Spanish, English, Science and even Mexican folkloric dance for their integral development and growth; in addition to carrying out various activities to promote the development of the community in precarious settlements, promote awareness and social action and create spaces of influence for decision making and definition of public policies.
